Emergency Flooding Alert

If you have active flooding, call us immediately at 1-800-WET-GONE. Our emergency response team is available 24/7.

Customer Testimonial

"DrySpace saved our home from severe water damage. Their team was professional, efficient, and the warranty gives us peace of mind."

- Sarah M., Toronto Homeowner

Pro Tip from Our Experts

Schedule your waterproofing in spring or fall when the ground is workable but water tables are manageable. This ensures optimal installation conditions.

FAQ Styling Options

What makes your waterproofing different?

We use a multi-layer approach combining:

  • • Rubberized membrane application
  • • Delta drainage board installation
  • • New weeping tile system
  • • Lifetime transferable warranty

How long does the process take?

Most residential projects complete in 3-5 days, depending on the home's perimeter and soil conditions.
